name: AngryBirdFlappForLove
description:
AngryBirdsFlappForLove is an endless runner game. The main character is an angry bird who flapps over obstacles to collect the heart.If you collect 3 hearts continuously, you will get a special power which will last only for 5 to 10 seconds. The time of the power related to how much time you take to collect 3 hearts.If you collect a hearts 5 point will add to your score.

Hope Everyone really enjo
